info.name: AdditionalSettingsGlobalLevel
info.description:
This is a collection of all REST APIs used in the additional settings to Command Center project.

Environment Variables used -
ServerUrl - url to the webservice
userName - username to login
password - password to login

request.description:
Description

(starting with V11 RTM) Commvault REST APIs support token-based authentication via the Authtoken request header. The POST Login API is used to retrieve the authentication token. Once obtained, the authentication token must be inserted into the Authtoken header for all requests. Note: The authentication token expires after 30 minutes of inactivity. [_More Details_](http://documentation.commvault.com/commvault/v11/article?p=features/rest_api/rest_api_authentication.htm)

exec: console.log(tests["Status code is 200"] = responseCode.code === 200); //validate status code
if(tests["All 194 Global keys are present"] = allGlobalKeysPresent);

request.description:
Description

This operation returns a list of all settings displayed in global settings tab. All settings with relative path - CommServDB.GxGlobalParam.

exec: console.log(tests["Status code is 200"] = responseCode.code === 200); //validate status code

request.description:
Description

This operation adds or modifies a global setting.

item.name: Get Added Global Settings - check addition of AccountLockDuration

exec: console.log(tests["Status code is 200"] = responseCode.code === 200); //validate status code
if(tests["The key 'AccountLockDuration' has been set to '1000'"] = passed);

request.description:
Description

This operation returns a list of added or modified settings displayed in global settings tab. Added or Modified settings with relative path - CommServDB.GxGlobalParam.

exec: console.log(tests["Status code is 200"] = responseCode.code === 200); //validate status code

request.description:
Description

This operation adds or modifies a global setting.

item.name: Get Added Global Settings - check edit of AccountLockDuration

exec: console.log(tests["Status code is 200"] = responseCode.code === 200); //validate status code
if(tests["The key 'AccountLockDuration' has been edited to '2147483647'"] = passed);

request.description:
Description

This operation returns a list of added or modified settings displayed in global settings tab. Added or Modified settings with relative path - CommServDB.GxGlobalParam.

exec: console.log(tests["Status code is 200"] = responseCode.code === 200); //validate status code

request.description:
Description

This operation deletes a global setting. API is same as Add Global Settings.

item.name: Get Added Global Settings - check deletion of AccountLockDuration

exec: console.log(tests["Status code is 200"] = responseCode.code === 200); //validate status code
passed = false; // AccountLockDuration should not be present after deletion
passed = true; // If 'regKeys' is not present also pass the testcase
if(tests["The key 'AccountLockDuration' has been deleted"] = passed);

request.description:
Description

This operation ends the current session. [_More Details_](http://documentation.commvault.com/commvault/v11/article?p=features/rest_api/operations/post_logout.htm)
